00029 class CSimpleCameraComp:

00033 public:
00034        typedef ibase::CLoggerComponentBase BaseClass;
00035 
00036        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(CSimpleCameraComp);
00037               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(icam::IBitmapAcquisition);
00038               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT(AdjustConstraints);
00039               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE_T(AdjustConstraints, imeas::ILinearAdjustConstraints, ExtractAdjustContraints);
00040               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT(ExposureConstraints);
00041               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE_T(ExposureConstraints, icam::IExposureConstraints, ExtractExposureContraints);
00042               I_ASSIGN(m_adjustParamsIdAttrPtr, "AdjustParamsId", "ID used to get brightness and contrast adjust parameters from the parameter set", false, "AdjustParams");
00043               I_ASSIGN(m_defaultAdjustParamsCompPtr, "DefaultAdjustParams", "Default contrast and brightness adjust parameters that will be used", false, "DefaultAdjustParams");
00044               I_ASSIGN(m_exposureParamsIdAttrPtr, "ExposureParamsId", "ID used to exposure parameters from the parameter set", false, "ExposureParams");
00045               I_ASSIGN(m_defaultExposureParamsCompPtr, "DefaultExposureParams", "Default exposure parameters that will be used", false, "DefaultExposureParams");
00046               I_ASSIGN(m_only8BitDepthAttrPtr, "Only8Bit", "Only modes with 8 bits will be accepted", true, true);
00047               I_ASSIGN(m_bufferSizeAttrPtr, "BufferSize", "Number of frames in camera buffer", true, 1);
00048               I_ASSIGN(m_waitTimeoutAttrPtr, "WaitTimeout", "Wait timeout for capture, if not set only frames currently acquired will be taken", false, 1);
00049        I_END_COMPONENT;
